name: Dash Cup Kickers
description:
Super fast paced arcade action soccer with
incredible power dashes, sweet mega tricks
and unbelieveable powerful super shots!

Play epic matches locally with and against your friends
and show your best skills in the career mode and online.

Discover exciting, truly varying stadiums
facing you with new challenges again and again.

Master all tricks, skill up your team,
develop the best technique and earn gold in all cups!

Enjoy a perfect multiplayer match with up to
4 controllers or up to 2 players on keyboard.

Comes with an outstanding, excellent,
ROKOJORI ® Radio approven soundtrack
